member.name: P:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.LogFilePath
member.summary: Path to log file where logger stores logs

member.name: P:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.LogJson
member.summary: Access file to get logs as JSON array

member.name: P:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.LogText
member.summary: Access file to get logs as plain text (formatted to JSON format)

member.name: P:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.AutoSave
member.summary: If set to true all changes are immadietely saved to log file. Otherwise changes are saved on SaveChanges() method or when logger is disposed.

member.name: M:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.Log(System.String,JsonLogger.LogCategory)
member.summary: Logs single-line text with specified category

member.name: M:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.Log(System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs exception with it's properties as JSON object (all exceptions are logged with 'Critical' category)

member.name: M:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.Log(System.String,System.Object,JsonLogger.LogCategory)
member.summary: Logs objects with it's public properties and fields as JSON object

member.name: M:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.LogException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs exception with it's properties as JSON object (all exceptions are logged with 'Critical' category)

member.name: M:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.LogObject(System.String,System.Object,JsonLogger.LogCategory)
member.summary: Logs objects with it's public properties and fields as JSON object

member.name: M:JsonLogger.JsonLogger.SaveChanges
member.summary: Saves changes to log file (if AutoSave property is set to false, all uncommited changes are kept in memory)
